Package package1

Class SupervisorRequest

java.lang.Object
package1.Request
package1.SupervisorRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
RequestChangeSupervisor
public abstract class SupervisorRequest extends Request
Parent Class of all possible requests than can be made by a supervisor, extends from Request class

  • Constructor Details

    • SupervisorRequest

      public SupervisorRequest(Supervisor sender, FYPCoordinator recipient, Project project, Supervisor replacementSupervisor)
      Constructs a new SupervisorRequest object with the specified sender, recipient, project, and replacement supervisor.
      Parameters:
      sender - the Supervisor who is sending the request.
      recipient - the FYPCoordinator who is the intended recipient of the request.
      project - the Project associated with the request.
      replacementSupervisor - the Supervisor who is to replace the current supervisor of the Project (optional).

  • Method Details

    • changeReplacementSupervisor

      public int changeReplacementSupervisor(Supervisor replacementSupervisor)
      Updates the replacement supervisor for this request.
      Parameters:
      replacementSupervisor - the new Supervisor who will replace the current supervisor of the Project.
      Returns:
      1 if the replacement supervisor was successfully updated, 0 if an error occurred.

    • displayReplacementSupervisor

      public void displayReplacementSupervisor()
      Displays the replacement supervisor for this request.

    • sendRequest

      public int sendRequest()
      Sends this request to the intended recipient.
      Overrides:
      sendRequest in class Request
      Returns:
      1 if the request was successfully sent, 0 if an error occurred.

    • create

      public int create(Supervisor sender, FYPCoordinator recipient, Project project, Supervisor replacementSupervisor)
      Creates a new SupervisorRequest with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      sender - the supervisor sending the request
      recipient - the FYP coordinator who will receive the request
      project - the project related to the request
      replacementSupervisor - the new supervisor assigned to the project, if any
      Returns:
      1 if the request was successfully created, 0 if an error occurred.

    • changeRecipient

      public int changeRecipient(FYPCoordinator recipient)
      Changes the recipient of this SupervisorRequest.
      Parameters:
      recipient - the new FYPCoordinator to receive the request
      Returns:
      1 if the recipient was successfully changed, 0 if an error occurred.

    • changeSender

      public int changeSender(Supervisor sender)
      Changes the sender of this SupervisorRequest.
      Parameters:
      sender - the new Supervisor to send the request
      Returns:
      1 if the sender was successfully changed, 0 if an error occurred.
